siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Listnr helps you start a Podcast in 100+ Voices and 22 languages without recording anything, we use Speech Synthesis technology from Google, Amazon, Microsoft and IBM to power Listnr and deliver great results!
blogPost.body: Listnr helps you start a Podcast in 100+ Voices and 22 languages without recording anything, we use Speech Synthesis technology from Google, Amazon, Microsoft and IBM to power Listnr and deliver great results!
blogPost.title: Listnr - Start a podcast without recording anything
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Listnr帮助你以100多种声音和22种语言开始播客，而无需录制任何东西，我们使用谷歌、亚马逊、微软和IBM的语音合成技术为Listnr提供动力，并提供伟大的结果。
localize.tagline: 不需要录制任何东西就能开始播客

localize.description: Listnr幫助你以100多種聲音和22種語言開始播客，而無需錄製任何東西，我們使用谷歌、亞馬遜、微軟和IBM的語音合成技術爲Listnr提供動力，並提供偉大的結果。
localize.tagline: 不需要錄製任何東西就能開始播客

previous.excerpt: Shuffle is an online editor for Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Bulma, and Material-UI. Today, we are launching our marketplace and two new UI libraries for Tailwind! https://shuffle.dev/marketplace
previous.title: UI Libraries by Shuffle - A marketplace for busy front-end developers

localize.description: Shuffle是一款针对尾风CSS、Bootstrap、Bulma和Material-UI的在线编辑器。今天，我们推出了我们的市场和两个新的UI库为尾风！https://shuffle.dev/marketplace。
localize.tagline: 为繁忙的前端开发者提供一个市场

localize.description: Shuffle是一款針對尾風CSS、Bootstrap、Bulma和Material-UI的在線編輯器。今天，我們推出了我們的市場和兩個新的UI庫爲尾風！https://shuffle.dev/marketplace。
localize.tagline: 爲繁忙的前端開發者提供一個市場

next.excerpt: Play board, card, and party games online with family and friends or gather your remote team for a fun team building activity. GameApart works with any video conference platform. New games are released monthly. Let's get this remote party started!
next.title: GameApart - Online board, card & party games on any video conference app

localize.description: 与家人和朋友在线玩棋盘、纸牌和派对游戏，或召集您的远程团队进行有趣的团队建设活动。GameApart可与任何视频会议平台配合使用。每月都会发布新游戏。让我们开始这场远程聚会吧!
localize.tagline: 在任何视频会议应用程序上进行在线棋牌和派对游戏。

localize.description: 與家人和朋友在線玩棋盤、紙牌和派對遊戲，或召集您的遠程團隊進行有趣的團隊建設活動。GameApart可與任何視頻會議平臺配合使用。每月都會發布新遊戲。讓我們開始這場遠程聚會吧!
localize.tagline: 在任何視頻會議應用程序上進行在線棋牌和派對遊戲。
